scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-bin; npm run install-hooks; npm run post-commit
scripts.install-hooks: for f in `ls .git-hooks`; do ln -sf ../../.git-hooks/${f} .git/hooks/${f}; done
scripts.install-bin: for f in `ls .bin`; do ln -sf ../../.bin/${f} node_modules/.bin/${f}; done
scripts.uninstall-hooks: for f in `ls .git-hooks`; do rm .git/hooks/${f}; done
scripts.uninstall-bin: for f in `ls .bin`; do rm node_modules/.bin/${f}; done
